fly-by-night.translation[0].definitions[: a fly-by-night company or businessman is one that you cannot trust because they have only been in business for a short time and are only interested in making quick profits
fly-by-night.translation[1].definitions[: a fly-by-night company or businessperson is not reliable and is only interested in making a quick profit and then disappearing
The authority requires surety bonds of $50,000 from health agencies to deter fly-by-night operations from joining the program.
